title: Hadn't restarted my Pixel 3 XL for a while. Tried and got stuck on "Phone is Restarting".
content:
Tried rebooting several times.
I can get to settings without logging in.
Uninstalled many Apps in case it was an App causing the issue. Still no success.
Tried to see if I could clear cache and could not get that option.
Had to resort to factory reset to get the phone to at least accept phone calls.
What is causing this? especially since my phone was working fine. I just wanted to do a restart!
Also do not know what is the best way to deal with this situation. What should I be trying as I could not find any good info that actually aligned and worked for the problem I was experiencing.
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
